name: ENTHAL
description:
We are Hexar, experts in making educational video games. So, that's what we did...

 Thinking about the theme of Joined Together, we thought about Chemistry and in particular the concept of Enthalpy. Our game is about the energy exchanges produced between atom bonds and how it affects you and your environment.

Welcome, this is our subatomic world. You are an Enthalpy particle, jump to join atoms and gain energy. Lose all your energy and you die. Enjoy and don't stop moving!

Hexar and Gang
